name: vendor-onboarding-app
description: The Vendoer Onboarding App is a user-friendly platform that facilitates the seamless registration process for new vendors seeking to offer their services to an organization. Tailored to meet the specific needs of both the vendors and the department, the application streamlines the onboarding experience, providing a straightforward and efficient way for vendors to submit their information and offerings. By leveraging modern technology, the app ensures a hassle-free registration process, contributing to the overall efficiency of the organizaation's vendor management system.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
